text:
Was told good things about this restaurant so we decided to try it while we were in town. The atmosphere was good. Service was good too. The food though was not good. I ordered the <lamb chops> and my friend ordered the <filet>. The <lamb chops> were okay. It's not that they didn't cook them well, it's just that the preparation was bad. The sauce that they came out in overpowered the meat. Each bite was a bit harder then the last. My friend said the <steak> had no flavor and was tough. With a good <filet>, you should be able to cut it with a fork. She said she needed to put effort in with the knife. 

Overall everything was okay. Why I give this restaurant a low review is because for how much everything costs we should have been amazed by the food. We were not. If you're in town looking for a good <steak>, look elsewhere.
